text: David B. Goldstein is an American energy conservation policy expert. He co- directs the Natural Resources Defense Council's Energy Program.http://savingenergygrowingjobs.com/segj-athr.html He currently serves as the board chair of the Institute for Market Transformation, which he co- founded in 1996.http://www.imt.org/about/board ==Life== He graduated from the University of California, Berkeley with a Ph.D. in Physics. ==Awards== * 2002 MacArthur Fellows Program * Fellow of the American Physical Society * Leo Szilard Award for Physics in the Public Interest * 2003 California Alumni Association’s Award for Excellence in Achievement ==References== ==External links== *"David B.
